text:
Part 2 is published at
https://p0w3rsh3ll.wordpress.com/2024/01/18/0x80070643-error_install_failure-part-2/

It aims at testing and resizing the recovery partition that is in use and sits
on the right of the OS disk (a GPT based disk).

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Feedback to Microsoft
